title: Hire Me Landing Page

title: Kimchi Tracker
description: Bootcamp group project to track Kimchi recipes. Fullstack application built with React, Vite, Gemini API and REST API Json-server.

title: Product List with Cart
description: Product list interface with dynamique cart and a CRUD-like in the browser build with Angular 18 and Typescript.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: Weather tracking application built with Angular 17, Typescript, and OpenWeather API.

title: FAQs Section
description: A simple FAQs section accordion built with Html (semantic) and pure CSS.
